title: (x) Save my life - Glue Regular {Grant (w/ BJ)}
content:
Can't for the life of me figure out what this is... can anyone help?   
 ![sample](http://web.archive.org/web/20070908123110im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/20670.jpg)   
Sorry about the quality, or lack thereof. The ugliness of it is fascinating...   
   
Thanks for your time,   
   
O.

 [‹ (x) The Long Goodbye (1973) title font - Blippo Bd {Mark S}](http://web.archive.org/web/20070908123110/http:/typophile.com/node/2035 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) 45rpm PRESS No. 24 - Interstate {Yves} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20070908123110/http:/typophile.com/node/2105 "Go to next forum topic")
author: asherah

comments.content:
I think that's the Papa Roach Font ...   
if not, it's from jim Marcus at t26.   
He did one years ago with the same flavor.   
   
 [http://www.rockrage.com/musicfonts2.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20070908123110/http:/www.rockrage.com/musicfonts2.html)

Sorry BJ, but judging by the following sample it's definitely **not** Papa Roach (or Polaroid as the download indicates).   
   
 ![Papa Roach (Polaroid) Sample](http://web.archive.org/web/20070908123110im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/20676.gif)

But you were right about Jim Marcus. It's a mixed-case treatment of [Glue Regular](http://web.archive.org/web/20070908123110/http:/www.t26.com/changeyourface.php?fontID=33037). See below.   
   
 ![Glue Regular Sample](http://web.archive.org/web/20070908123110im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/20679.gif)

Kick save and a beauty!   
   
Thanks Grant ... you guys are getting scary good   
at nailing these suckers.   
   
bj
bj, they aren't "getting" scary-good they ARE scary-good
I like to think that we're
